basics.name: Mckenzie Halpern
basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who loves working with open source technology. I work best in planning the architecture of web applications and their development life. I also love to get the community involved and have had much experience with building and organizing large open source groups.

highlights: Gained knowledge about managing, the responsive design / ux
work.summary: Working on the development team and backend related to integrations, and providing guidance to support systems like systems architecture and development, staging environments, and virtual servers and desktop infrastructure.

My main duties were to provide guidance to end users on the use of the services provided by the operator, also if it was necessary I had to generate network issue tickets and provide the maximum possible of for an effective solution of the problem

highlights: • Worked closely with product managers and software engineers to provide solutions, technical documents or companies.
Developed and streamlined a process training for our platform
work.summary: As a part of my own initiative I created the system for the dance school from scratch to complete 8 / full projects. Working full with digital project managers like, etc.
